ability.name: Spirit of Vengeance
ability.description: Each time the Corvus is hit, it increases the Armor Piercing, Shield Piercing, and Accuracy by 40% (cumulative).

ability.name: Warbird
ability.description: As long as the opponent is Burning, the D'deridex increases the number of shots of each weapon by 0.1 (cumulative). Weapon shots are rounded to the nearest whole number

ability.name: Crystal Mining Laser
ability.description: The Mining Rate of Crystal is increased by 420%.

ability.name: Universal Mining Laser
ability.description: When mining 5* Crystal, Gas and Ore, The Nova's mining speed is increased by 150%

ability.name: Intimidating Presence
ability.description: When fighting Hostiles, the Quv'Sompek decreases Hostile Armor Piercing, Shield Piercing, and Accuracy by 12% for the first 5 rounds of combat.

ability.name: Bird of Prey
ability.description: As long as the opponent has a Hull Breach, every time the Rotarran deals a Critical Hit with a weapon attack, it increases the Critical Hit Damage by 10% (cumulative).

ability.name: Drain of the Empire
ability.description: When fighting Hostiles, the Sanctus decreases Hostile Shield Health by 10% at the beginning of each round for the first 5 rounds of combat.

ability.name: Gas Mining Laser
ability.description: The Mining Rate of Gas is increased by 420%.

ability.name: Gunboat Diplomacy
ability.description: When fighting Hostiles, the USS Crozier decreases Hostile Critical Hit Damage by 2% for the first 5 rounds of combat.

ability.name: Galaxy Class
ability.description: As long as the ship has Morale, the USS Enterprise-D increases the Weapon Damage by 85% each round (cumulative).

ability.name: Just Reprisal
ability.description: Each time the USS Northcutt is hit, it increases the Weapon Damage by 2% (cumulative).

ability.name: Best Served Cold
ability.description: Each time the Vor'Cha is hit, it increases the Critical Hit Damage by 1% (cumulative).

ability.name: Concentrated Latinum Mining

ability.name: Open the Wound
ability.description: As long as the opponent has a Hull Breach, every time the Hegh'ta hits it with a weapon attack, it increases the Critical Hit Chances by 2%.

ability.name: Imperial Might
ability.description: The ISS Jellyfish gains an additional 15% damage bonus at the start of every combat round. This bonus stacks with no limit.

ability.name: Offense is the best Defense
ability.description: When defending,at the start of each round, the K'T'inga increases the Damage of all Ships and Defense Platforms by 10%.

ability.name: Loot the Weak
ability.description: The Korinar gains 10% more resources from Hostiles.

ability.name: Actian Corrupter
ability.description: Mantis Damage is increased by +62,000% against Actian hostiles.

ability.name: Empire Tax
ability.description: The Pilum gains 10% more resources from Hostiles.

ability.name: Fire Barrage
ability.description: As long as the opponent is Burning at the start of a round, the Tribune increases the number of shots of each weapon by 1 for this round.

ability.name: Keep It Together
ability.description: When the USS Cerritos supports another ship, increase the support duration by 5 seconds. Supported ships gain significant combat bonuses based on the completed Cerritos research of the recipient.

ability.name: Resourceful Approach
ability.description: Increase Edict rewards by 250% when using the Defiant

ability.name: Optimized Crew Interface
ability.description: As long as the USS Enterprise A has Morale , everytime it gets hit, it increases the Weapon Damage by 1%.

ability.name: Swarm Hunter
ability.description: When fighting Swarm Hostiles or Swarm Armadas, The Franklin-A's Damage is increased by 3,500%

ability.name: Gas Mining Laser

ability.name: Inventive Strategy
ability.description: When defending, at the start of each round, the USS Kelvin increases the Shield Piercing, Armor Piercing and Accuracy of every Ship and Defense Platform by 30%.

ability.name: Confiscate Evidence
ability.description: The USS Newton gains 10% more resources from Hostiles.

ability.name: Under Titan's Aegis
ability.description: 2 alliance ships affected when Fortification or Maximum Fortification is activated (prioritizes strongest ships and alliance members without the ability.)

ability.name: Feels Like Home
ability.description: The USS Voyager increases its base damage by +50,000% against hostiles with the Delta Quadrant [DQ] tag.

ability.name: Advanced Cloaking
ability.description: When defending, at the start of each round, the Valdore increases the Shield Deflection, Armor and Dodge of all ships and Defense platforms by 30%.

ability.description: Increase damage by 35,000% against Borg hostiles.

ability.name: Ore Mining Laser
ability.description: The Mining Rate of Ore is increased by 120%.

ability.name: Combat Scavenger
ability.description: After winning a battle, if the target has more resources than the Amalgam's available Cargo Space, the Amalgam fills its Cargo Space and then takes an additional 0.01% of the remaining resources. This ability only activates if the Amalgam has available empty Cargo Space before attacking.

ability.name: Obliterate
ability.description: As long as the opponent's ship is Burning, if the opponent is hit with the Obliterator weapon, the AUGUR increases all weapon damage by 50.00% (cumulative).

ability.name: Cloaking System
ability.description: When fighting Hostiles, for the first round of Combat, the B'REL decreases the opponent's ship Armor Piercing, Shield Piercing and Accuracy by 15%.

ability.name: Revenge
ability.description: When defending the Station, The BORTAS increases the damage of all the other ships and Defense Platforms by 10%.

ability.name: Data Mining
ability.description: The Botany Bay's Mining Bonus from the Mining Laser is increased by 26,500% when mining Corrupted Data and Decoded Data.

ability.description: When defending , The CENTURION increases the Armor, Shield deflection and Dodge of all ships and defense platforms by 20%.
